definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort

sentences.english: After her shoplifting spree she lived in mortal dread of being found out.
sentences.chinese: 在商店連番行竊之後，她惶恐終日，害怕給人發現。

sentences.english: For David everything got worse before he was restored to the throne.
sentences.chinese: 大衛經歷了連番傷痛，最後才重掌王位。

sentences.english: Beauty zhen overwhelming inquiry, was ordered to not only cause panic all the colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 美貞連番追問，只被命令不可引起衆同事恐慌。
